summary: s390/qeth: fix deadlock during failing recovery
details:
s390/qeth: fix deadlock during failing recovery

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.10 by commit 0bfe741741327822d1482c7edef0184636d08b40, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit b41b554c1ee75070a14c02a88496b1f231c7eacc. For more details please see the references link.
